channel.title: How can I trade an Npc after i've made it into a shop and everything?
channel.description: When I try to trade my shop keeper after i've added it to autospawn and made the shops for it i've also added the WanneShop in client and everything it just doesnt let me trade it...or talk to it nothing pops up. Any help/ideas?
